relevance_explanation: The trimmed routine includes only steps relevant to the customer, using data to skip irrelevant branches (cancellation allowed, blockers, etc.). Steps not applicable because the flight is non-refundable have been removed. The welcome message acknowledges the customer's Gold status.
completeness_explanation: All steps required for this customer were preserved. The routine correctly identifies the non-refundable nature of the flight and completes the case after informing the customer.
